explains: n. 评审员；确定税款的人；顾问

sentences.en: The mainly influential factors to the construct validity of assessment center are dimension, exercise, assessor, assessee and rating method.
sentences.cn: 影响评价中心结构效度的因素主要有测评维度、测评情景、测评师、测评对象和评分方法。

sentences.en: Use the business rules to select the assessor to perform the assessment.
sentences.cn: 用业务规则选择进行评估的评估员。
